description: Supine RDI at 2% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in supine body position associated with >= 2% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: rdi2ps  = 60*(hrembp2 + hnrbp2 + carbp2 + canbp2 + oarbp2 + oanbp2)/(remepbp+nremepbp)

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Supine RDI at 2% desat
